1371: Gosuinus was born in St. Joris straet in 1371.
1389: Gosuinus moved to Helle voet.B.9 after marriage.
Got married to Emmelina at age 19 in 1389.
1392: Gosuinus moved to Die Coninc straet.D.7 after marriage.
Got married a second time to Truden at age 22 in 1392.
1374: Lost mother at the age of 3.
1390: Lost son Ricward when Ricward was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Emmelina and their son Ricward  while Emmelina was giving birth when he was 19.
1394: Had a son with Truden, Richolfus, at age 23.
1395: Had a daughter with Truden, Gheesen, at age 24.
1396: Had a son with Truden, Adolfus, at age 25.
1397: Had a daughter with Truden, Ymmekine, at age 26.
Lost son Richolfus when Richolfus was 4 years old.
